text: Responsible for the Following: What you will do: 1. Deliver core business-facing features of our platform. 2. Work closely with the product team to create a delightful user experience. 3. Work closely with the backend team to design APIs. Key Qualifications: 1. 2+ years of experience in a similar role. 2. Prior experience building Frontend web applications using React, Redux, ES6/7 and core principles of React.js like hooks, effects, rendering cycle. 3. Knowledge of Isomorphic React, Redux-Saga and React.js workflows like Flux & Redux. 4. Excellent knowledge of HTTP protocol, cookies, headers, DOM rendering, caching, browser network 5. Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM etc. Solid understanding in core web and browser concepts (e.g. how does JavaScript handle asynchronous code) 6. Solid understanding of CSS (SASS/SCSS), semantic HTML and core JavaScript concepts. Role â€“ Brand & Distribution Manager
